# didCloseNotification

**Type Property**

Sent after the popover has finished animating offscreen.

## Declaration

```swift
class let didCloseNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The value of the `userInfo` key [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/closeReasonUserInfoKey] specifies the reason for closing. It can currently be either [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/CloseReason/standard] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/CloseReason/detachToWindow], although more reasons for closing may be added in the future.

## Notifications

- **willShowNotification**: Sent before the popover is shown.
- **didShowNotification**: Sent after the popover has finished animating onscreen.
- **willCloseNotification**: Sent before the popover is closed.
